```{r, Question 1}
reg_function_coef = function(x){
    reg = felm(x ~ public | 0 | 0 | clustercode, 
               data = envelopes)
    coef = coef(reg)[2]
    return(coef)
}

reg_function_coef(envelopes$hyperbolic)
```
